Key Match Events: Rahmanullah Gurbaz was bowled by Lahiru Kumara for 28 runs

Post-Match Reflections: Wanindu Hasaranga was awarded the Player of the Match award for his 3/13 bowling performance
Dhananjaya de Silva was awarded the CRICINFO'S MVP award for his 98.33 points performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka won the match by 6 wickets with 9 balls remaining
Others: The match was played at the Brisbane Cricket Ground, Woolloongabba, Brisbane
The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022-23 series
